title: Couple's Court: Kristin Vs Her Husband Vs The Neighborhood
description:
Kristin wants to do something for the neighbors. Her husband says, "Absolutely not!"
SO, like any good radio family, they're putting the decision in your hands! What do you think they should do?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
